A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Luke story line goes against Jedi theory about fear. The chosen one theory that Anakin was stronger in force because he was chosen and that if he had children they would be stronger in force than average Jedi is thrown out with Rey. I therefore see this movie as being inconsistent with previous Star Wars Movie lore. How Fin is handled also sucks as well as Maz\, Holdo/Akabar. I am still glad I saw the movie and love Star Wars. This is just a poor story. It’s is still Star Wars though.
